overview:
Gustavo advises businesses and individuals how to use the internet for growth, for good, and to deliver value.

Gustavo Hernando holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Systems Engineering with a concentration in Databases and an Associateâ€™s in Digital Media. In 2006 he started Seventh Degree, an internet consulting company, in which he captures the attention of his clients with a multi-faceted approach to user experience design.

Realizing the frustration many of them faced in growing their online businesses, he launched BusinessBrite in 2008 as a solution to that problem. On top of that, he is responsible for a large part of designing and documenting Full Sail Universityâ€™s Online platform, including managing staff and student expectations.

In 2010 he launched DaFoodie.com to help people decide what and where to eat in Orlando, FL., where he currently resides.
